A reverse image search on Google confirm: 3. Examination of the Mexico-Guatemala border using Google Earth revealed that there is no arid desert stretch that could support the fence depicted in the claim. Much of the border includes portions of the Suchiate River, which can be easily crossed.
The fencing used at one official border: as shown in AFP photos, is a simple chain-link fence, which is visually different from the fence depicted in the claim.
